Title: Fireside chat: How customers are unlocking value & growth with Copilot | BRK292
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Colette Stallbaumer will host a Microsoft customer on stage to discuss how they are leveraging Copilot to drive growth, the transformative impact of agents, and their journey toward becoming a Frontier Firm.
